Zynga games are a fun way to connect with friends and to meet like-minded people. Our community thrives on trust, fair play, and good gamesmanship. To keep things fun and fair, it is important that you know and follow our game guidelines when playing:
Zynga games should provide an environment of friendly competition. Harassment, excessive foul or offensive language, threats, or other harmful chat or interactions are not allowed.
No scalping. No selling or attempting to sell chips or points to another player, and no purchasing or attempting to purchase chips or points from another player.
Real people only. No bots allowed.
Be yourself, and only yourself. You may not attempt to steal account credentials from another user, and you may not log on as other users. Also, you may not use multiple accounts.
Playing fair means no cheating. Don't use other software or methods to attempt to gain an unfair advantage over your fellow players.
Zynga may, in its sole discretion, ban players and/or remove chips and points from players if Zynga believes that those players have not behaved in accordance with these guidelines.

Poker is a 5-card game. Players are given an opportunity to bet on their hands. The player with the best hand wins. Hands are rated according to the following scale:
'a pair of 10s with a Jack kicker' or
a pair of 10s with a Jack, Seven kicker
If both players have the exact same hand, then both players win and the pot is split evenly between them.
The highest set of 3 wins. If both players have the same set of 3, then the highest set of 2 wins.
The player with the highest rank card wins (an ace acting as a '1' in a straight is considered low).
'2-Pair', 'Pair' , '3 of a Kind', '4 of a Kind'
Compare the matched cards for highest card. If there is still a tie, compare the 'kicker' cards.
The following hands could be made:

Texas Hold'em is a version of 7-card poker. This means that by the end of the round, the player will have 7 cards to choose from to make a 5-card hand. For example, if the user has these cards to choose from:

If you do not have enough money to call a bet, you may go 'all-in'. This means that you are betting everything you have left. If you go all-in, you are not allowed to win more money than you were able to call. If the pot increases after you go all-in and you win, the pot will be split between you and the player with the next best hand who was able to cover the raises.
In Zynga Poker, the computer automatically determines your best possible hand, so in this case you would be considered to have the flush.

Proceeding clockwise, all other players must either match the blind bets ('call'), raise or fold. If someone raises, all players must match the new amount to stay in. If a player folds, they are no longer participating in the hand and may not bet or win. Once all players have had the opportunity to raise or match the current bet amount, the round of betting ends. All bets are moved to the center of the table. The total chips on the table is called the 'pot'.
The dealer changes after every hand, so all players will take turns paying the blind bets.

The player to the left of the dealer is forced to bet the "Small Blind". The next player to the left is forced to bet the "Big Blind". The big blind is double the small blind. The blinds are set by the table rules and appear as two numbers separated by a slash, for example: 5/10 or 500/1000
A player may not bet or raise an amount that is less than the big blind amount.

Each player is dealt two cards face down. These are called 'Hole cards'. No other players see your hole cards. After the hole cards are dealt, there is a round of betting. The first round of betting involves 'Blind' bets.

Three cards are dealt face up on the table. These are 'community' cards. Community cards are shared by all players, meaning all players may build their hands from these cards. After the flop, there is another round of betting beginning with the first player to the left of the dealer. A player may check (bet nothing) and remain in the hand. If another player bets, checking players will be given another opportunity to bet or fold.
One more card is dealt face up on the table. After the turn there is another round of betting.

One final card is dealt face up on the table. There are now 5 cards on the table and 2 cards in your hand: 7 cards total. From these 7 cards, the computer will pick your best 5-card hand. It is possible that the 5 cards on the table make the best hand -in this case it is possible that all players may have the same hand. After the river, there is one more round of betting.
Texas Hold'em is played over 4 rounds. Each round allows players to bet or fold. If no player bets, the next round begins.

After the final round of betting, it is time to determine a winner. The last player to bet (not call) must show his cards first. All other players still in the hand (they have not folded) then show their cards. The winning player takes the whole pot.
If two or more players tie, the pot is split evenly between them.
Texas Hold'em is the most popular type of poker played in casinos and seen on television.
If at any time, only one player remains in the hand (all others have folded), the hand ends immediately and the remaining player wins the pot.
If you think you've been scammed, immediately change your Facebook/MySpace password. Don't let the scammers do any more damage.
If you think you've been scammed, immediately change your social network password (Facebook/MySpace/Yahoo/etc). Don't let the scammers do any more damage.
Zynga, Facebook and Myspace will never email you asking for passwords, credit card numbers or other sensitive information.
Zynga, Facebook, Myspace and Yahoo will never email you asking for passwords, credit card numbers or other sensitive information.

Zynga will never communicate with you via in game chat.
Zynga will never ask for your log-in email and password.
Never accept links or downloads from strangers regarding free chips.
Always check the URL when entering personal information.
Tips to identify hackers and spammers:
Usually Zynga can track down the cause and return your chips to you. Be patient. If you know the website or email address responsible, be sure to report it!
Scams are an unavoidable threat on the internet, and even Zynga Poker isn't safe. There are people who want your chips and will try anything to steal them from you.
Uninstall Java, then re-install the latest version,
Change the password to your e-mail account
Change the password to your Facebook/MySpace account
Change the password to your social network account (Facebook/MySpace/Yahoo/etc.)
Before reporting, please do as many of the following as you can:
Using scripts and manual processes to abusively accumulate free chips is not allowed and will result in your account(s) being suspended or banned.

You can gift chips to Poker Buddies using the 'send chips' tool. This tool is found by clicking on a buddy's picture at the table or by viewing their profile page. However, you are not allowed to send these gifts in exchange for money or money equivalent. Doing so will result in your accounts beings suspended and/or banned.

You are allowed 1 account per social network. In addition, you cannot use multiple accounts to try to accumulate free chips (aka chip farming). This behavior is easily detectible and will result in all your accounts being suspended and/or banned.

The only allowed method for transferring chips between users is by using the "send chips" tool. Losing hands on purpose at the table to send chips to a friend (or yourself on another account) is a violation of our Terms of Service and is aggressively enforced through account suspensions and/or banning.

Actions like playing a hand, winning a hand, entering a tournament and placing in a tournament will award experience points. As these points accumulate the player raises his level and items will be unlocked.
Increasing in level may unlock: on table drinks, snacks, smokes and entertainment, new chip gifts or a new achievement to work toward.
NOTE: There is a limit of 2000 XP that can be earned per day.

Be civil and courteous of your fellow players. Do not be abusive, disrespectful, harassing or hostile and do not haze or attack others.
Do not impersonate or attempt to impersonate Zynga employees or other players.
Do not insert any viruses, adware, spyware, worms or any other malicious code into any games or in-game communications.
Do not execute, promote or describe methods for circumventing or manipulating Zynga Terms of Service, game rules or the mechanics of any aspect of the Zynga Service.
Do not upload content that links to or promotes non-Zynga products or services, including content describing or promoting the unauthorized sale or transfer of Zynga’s virtual goods.
Do not encourage other players to participate in commercial activity or scams that violate Zynga’s Terms of Service.

Do not post or link to content that contains (i) pornography; (ii) obscene or sexually explicit remarks or images; (iii) threatening or defamatory remarks or images; (iv) hateful, racially or ethnically offensive remarks or images; (v) descriptions or promotions of illegal activity; or (vi) links to sites that contain any of the aforementioned content.
Do not violate any applicable laws, contractual restrictions or any other third party rights.
Zynga strives to provide a gaming experience that supports positive interactions between players. Help us provide a positive gaming experience for all players.
For a full list of dos and don’ts for in-game conduct, see Zynga’s

Don’t forget that violating Zynga’s Terms of Service could get you suspended from Zynga’s games and services. Also, be aware that Zynga will respond to clear notices of alleged copyright, trademark or other intellectual property rights infringement. For more information, please visit our
Zynga recognizes that Play is just one part of life and that there can be too much of a good thing.
Some players may become concerned with the amount of time or money spent on internet sites or mobile apps, such as Zynga’s games.

If you have concerns about your internet or mobile device usage, please consider consulting with a psychologist or other mental health professional. In addition, there are number of resources available to you online, including:
(Please note that Zynga does not endorse the organizations or individuals associated with the links above or the statements made on the associated websites.)

Never give anyone your login name and password for your Zynga account or for the platform on which you play Zynga games (e.g., Facebook, Apple, Google Play, etc.). Zynga and its employees will never ask for your login information.
Never give out your personal information, like your social security number or full credit card information, to anyone.
Don’t reuse your passwords. Create a unique and strong password for every account or login you have.
Be wary of messages that sound too good to be true (such as advertisements for free chips or virtual currency).
Always use caution when clicking on a link and consider the source. If someone sends you a link to a web page that requires you to input your login or password, close that page immediately.

This also applies to links posted on Zynga Fanpages by other players. Just because a link is posted by another player on a Zynga Fanpage doesn’t mean that the link is approved by Zynga. We do our best to take down scammy or phishing posts when we learn about them, but be smart before you click.
Our goal at Zynga is to provide the most fun, most social, and overall best online gaming experience possible, and that means ensuring that Zynga games are safe and secure.

We go to great lengths to protect your information and your privacy, but there are also simple things you can do as a player to contribute to the safety of Zynga’s games. For example, taking a few steps to protect your Zynga account will help make sure your gameplay remains fun and uninterrupted.

When you log in to Zynga Poker, you have 7 days to complete a tougher challenge with bigger rewards than a normal Daily Challenge.
Tap on the "Redeem" button in the Challenges menu accessed in the Lobby.
You can earn tickets by completing the objectives in a Challenge and the amount of tickets awarded is based on the difficulty of the Challenge.
You earn tickets by completing the objectives in a Challenge.
Each game mode has a color associated with it: green means “play at any table”, red means “play at Hold’em or Jump tables”, and blue means “play at Sit-N-Go tables.”
Each game mode has a color associated with it: green means “play at any table”, red means “play at Hold’em tables”, and blue means “play any Tournament.”

Each game mode has a color associated with it: green means “play at any table”, red means “play at Hold’em tables”, and blue means “play a Sit-N-Go tournament", purple means "play a Spin & Win tournament'.
Each game mode has a color associated with it: green means play at any table, red means play at Hold'em tables, blue means play a Sit-N-Go tournament, and purple means play a Spin & Win tournament.
There are two types of timed Challenges: Daily Challenges last for 24 hours and Weekly Challenges last for 7 days.
There are two types of timed Challenges: Daily Challenges that last for 24 hours and Weekly Challenges that last for 7 days.
There are three types of timed Challenges. Dailes last 24 hours, Weeklies last 7 days. Event Challenges usually vary in length, so be sure to check the timer on those.
If you win chips from a hand, you’ll progress through these Challenges.
These Challenges are focused on winning hands or tournaments.
Putting any money into the pot allows you to participate in these Challenges, including blinds.
Progress is tracked as you play and notifications pop up at the table as you work on objectives. You can also meet the progress requirements for multiple Challenges at once!
You will receive 3 new Challenges every day and one weekly Challenge every week.
You will receive 3 new Challenges every day and 1 weekly Challenge every week.
You will receive 3 new Daily Challenges every day, and 1 Weekly challenge every week. Event Challenges will vary in the frequency and amount.

Event Challenges will only surface if an event is active (e.g., Fast Cash). During the event, complete the Challenge to earn tickets as you would for a normal Daily Challenge. Note that the required table details will be surfaced in the Event.
Event Challenges appear only while an Event is active. Earn a variety of prizes for each Challenge completed. Finish all Event Challenges to earn the Grand Prize!
A skip allows you to replace your existing Challenge with a new Challenge type, e.g. a ‘Play 5 hands’ Challenge can change to ‘Win $5k chips’ Challenge.
Every 24 hours you have a set number of skips. Once you’ve run out, your new set of skips will appear once the 24 hour cooldown has been reached.
How many skips do I have?
A Hot Streak Challenge is a series of Challenges that gets harder each time you complete it. The harder the Challenge, the more tickets you earn! Complete as many as you can before they expire.
The more Hot Streak Challenges you complete, the more tickets you can earn each day. The toughest Streaks will reward you with the most tickets!
You can get Hot Streak Challenges by completing your Daily Challenges each day. Your Weekly Challenge does not need to be completed in order to start a Streak.
What do I get for Hot Streak Challenges?
How do I get a Hot Streak Challenge?

Welcome to the Zynga Poker Event feature! Now you can play Zynga Poker in a whole different way.{newline}{newline}What is the Sit-n-Go Event?{newline}-The Sit-n-Go Event pits players against each other in a one round tournament game, better known as Sit-n-Go. If you win 1st place for the required number of times, you will earn a Zynga Poker Trophy.{newline}{newline}What do the Trophies do?{newline}-The more Trophies you earn, the higher you will go on the leaderboard.{newline}{newline}Do I get to keep the Trophy?{newline}-Yes.{newline}{newline}How do I show it?{newline}-Click on the gift icon around your profile Chiclet while sitting at table. Then select the Trophy tab, find and select the trophy to show it at the table.

KCON Mobile Master Qualifier Sweepstakes{newline}{newline}OFFICIAL RULES{newline}{newline}NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT OF ANY KIND IS NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN THIS SWEEPSTAKES. A PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING.{newline}{newline}Please read these rules before entering the Amazon Appstore and Zynga KCON Mobile Master Qualifier Sweepstakes (the "Sweepstakes"). You agree that, by submitting an entry, you will be bound by these Official Rules and you acknowledge that you satisfy all Sweepstakes eligibility requirements.{newline}{newline}Eligibility. If you are an individual legal resident of the 50 United States or the District of Columbia and at least 21 years of age at the time of entry, you are eligible to enter the Sweepstakes. The Sweepstakes is not open to employees or independent contractors, or immediate family members (spouses, domestic partners, parents, grandparents, siblings, children, and grandchildren) or those living in the same household of employees or independent contractors of Amazon Digital Services LLC ("Sponsor," "we," or "us"), Zynga Inc. ("Zynga"), any entity involved in any aspect of the Sweepstakes, and each of their respective parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, advisors, or advertising/promotion agencies (collectively, the "Sweepstakes Entities"). The Sweepstakes is subject to all applicable U.S. federal, state and local laws and regulations. Void where prohibited by law.{newline}{newline}Sweepstakes Period. The Sweepstakes begins July 10, 2017 at 12:00:01 p.m. (PDT) and ends July 15, 2017 at 11:59:59 a.m. (PDT) (the "Sweepstakes Period").{newline}{newline}How to Enter. To enter, during the Sweepstakes Period you must enter via either Entry Method #1 or Entry Method #2 below:{newline}{newline}Entry Method #1:{newline}1. Download the free Zynga Poker App from the Amazon, Apple, or Google Appstores and install it on one (1) of your compatible devices;{newline}2. Log in to the Zynga Poker App via Facebook or your Facebook-connected mobile device; and{newline}3. Participate and win First Place in one of the the Mobile Masters Sit n Go Tournaments.{newline}{newline}You must win First Place in one (1) of the Mobile Masters Sit n Go Tournaments to receive one (1) entry. Standard data fees for data service may apply. See your data service provider for pricing plan details.{newline}{newline}You must have a Facebook account and be logged in to enter the Sweepstakes. By entering the Sweepstakes via Entry Method #1, you consent to Zynga sharing your Facebook account information, including your contact information, with Sponsor for purposes of Sponsor’s sweepstakes administration and prize fulfillment.{newline}{newline}Entry Method #2:{newline}{newline}Alternatively, you may receive one (1) entry by completing and submitting the Sweepstakes entry form located at: https://goo.gl/forms/gOuI9VMmOWXJENTT2{newline}{newline}To be eligible for the Sweepstakes drawing, we must receive eligible entries by 11:59:59 a.m. (PDT) on July 15, 2017. Limit one (1) entry per person using only one (1) e-mail address throughout the Sweepstakes Period, regardless of entry method. You may not use multiple e-mail addresses to enter the Sweepstakes, and entries submitted through multiple e-mail addresses will be disqualified.{newline}{newline}Other Promotions. Please note that we may be running similar sweepstakes at the same time as this Sweepstakes. By entering this Sweepstakes, you will not be eligible to receive any prize awarded in any other sweepstakes unless you enter each sweepstakes separately.{newline}{newline}Prizes. We will award each of the six (6) winners the following prizes as described below:{newline}• Round trip economy class airfare for each winner and one (1) guest departing from an airport near the winner’s residence (as determined by Sponsor in its sole discretion) and arriving at an airport in or near Los Angeles, CA (as determined by Sponsor in its sole discretion) (the "Airfare");{newline}• Two (2) nights standard hotel accommodations for the winner and one (1) guest (single room, double occupancy) at a hotel in Los Angeles, CA (as determined by Sponsor in its sole discretion) (the "Hotel"); and{newline}• KCON Mobile Masters Poker Tournament in Los Angeles, CA scheduled to take place on August 20, 2017 (the "Event").{newline}{newline}The Approximate Retail Value ("ARV") of each prize is $2400.00.{newline}{newline}General Prize Conditions. Prizes will be fulfilled by Sponsor or Sponsor’s prize provider agency. If you are selected as the potential winner, Sponsor or Sponsor’s prize provider agency will use the information you submit in connection with this Sweepstakes to fulfill the prize. Winners will be responsible for paying all costs and expenses related to the prize that are not specifically mentioned herein, including but not limited to, taxes and any other expenses that might reasonably be incurred by winners in receiving or using the prize.{newline}{newline}Prize Conditions. To claim their prizes, the Prize winners must agree to wear Zynga-branded clothing, which will be provided by Zynga, to the Event and must agree not to wear any clothing bearing the trademarks of any Zynga competitor, as determed by Zynga in its sole discretion. The winners will also be required to submit their social security numbers or tax payer ID numbers to Sponsor in order to claim the prize. Winners will be responsible for paying all costs and expenses related to the prizes that are not specifically mentioned herein, including but not limited to, taxes, additional transportation, additional food and beverages, gratuities, incidentals, souvenirs, baggage costs, telephone charges, excursions, travel insurance, upgrades, and any other expenses that might reasonably be incurred by winner in receiving or using the prize.{newline}{newline}Exact date and time of both trips are to be determined by Sponsor, in its sole discretion. The ARV represents Sponsor’s good faith determination. That determination is final and binding and cannot be appealed. Actual value of the prizes may vary based on factors at time of booking, including, but not limited to, dates of travel, date and time of travel booking, airfare fluctuations, and distance between departure and destination. Any difference between stated value and actual value will not be awarded.{newline}{newline}Guests of the winners must also be at least 21 years of age. Winners must travel on the same itinerary as their guests. If a winner reside within a 125-mile radius of the Hotel, air transportation may not be provided and the winner and his/her guest may be provided with ground transportation to/from the winner’s residence to Hotel in lieu thereof. Winners and their guests must have and are solely responsible for obtaining all necessary identification and/or travel documents required for travel, including, but not limited to, a valid U.S. driver's license or government issued passport (if applicable). Travel dates are at the sole discretion of Sponsor. If the potential winners are unable to participate in the prize during the dates specified, the prize may be forfeited and Sponsor may select an alternative potential winner for the prize. Travel must be made through Sponsor’s agent, on a carrier of Sponsor’s choice. Winners and their guests must comply with all Hotel and Event rules and regulations. Failure to do so may result in forfeiture of such portion of prize. If any winner for any reason is unable to play in the Event, all Event portions of the prize will not be forfeited however all remaining elements of the prize will be awarded and{newline}Sweepstakes Entities will have no further obligation to the winner. Upon any prize forfeiture, no compensation will be given.{newline}Sweepstakes Entities are not responsible for any cancellations, delays, diversions or substitution, or any act or omissions whatsoever by the air carriers, hotels, transportation companies, prize providers, or any other persons providing any prize-related services or accommodations. Lost, stolen, or damaged airline tickets, travel vouchers, or certificates will not be replaced or exchanged. All portions of the prizes are subject to availability and change and are at the sole discretion of Sponsor.{newline}{newline}In the event the Event is postponed, Sponsor reserves the right in its sole discretion to revise the dates of travel consistent with the revised Event date. In the event the Event is cancelled or postponed and Sponsor is unable to revise travel dates, all Event portions of the prize will not be awarded however all remaining elements of the prize will be awarded and Sweepstakes Entities will have no further obligation to the winners.{newline}{newline}Prize Drawing. 2 cards of the same rank + 2 cards of the same rank
All 5 cards are of the same suit
3 cards of the same rank + two cards of the same rank.
If you have no other hand, your highest card is your hand. For example: 'high card ace' or 'high card queen'

In any hand that does not use all 5 of the player's cards, the highest leftover card is called the 'kicker'. The kicker is used to compare ties. In some cases the kicker may need to include your top two or three leftover cards (this would happen if both players had the same kicker).
All 5 cards are in sequential order.
Aces can either come before a 2 to start a straight or after a King to end a straight.
All 5 cards are in sequential order and the same suit (see Straight and Flush below).
In all of the illustrated hand examples given above, the higher hand has been given first.

Compete on the leaderboard each week.
Win and redeem tickets for great prizes.
You will earn tickets each week you advance to a higher League. Tickets can be redeemed for great prizes. Players that are in the highest Leagues earn more tickets.

After playing a hand you will be automatically placed on a leaderboard with 99 other players from your League each week. Your ranking on the leaderboard is determined by your total chips won across all game modes. Earn the most chips to climb to the top and maintain your position!
Check the top row of the leaderboard to find an advancement goal. You will advance to a higher League immediately if you win the required amount of chips.

Finish at the top of the leaderboard to advance to a higher League at the end of the week. If you finish at the bottom you will be moved down a League. There are 20 Leagues, can you reach the highest one?

Rules and Prizes{newline}{newline}MULTI-TABLE TOURNAMENT RULES{newline}{newline}Congratulations you are about to embark in one of the largest Poker table games out there!{newline}{newline}How does it work?{newline}{newline}You will be competing in a Multi-Table Tournament format game (also known as MTT.) Each player will begin with the same number of chips and will compete without a break. As players bust out, tables are consolidated down to a final table until one winner remains. No rebuys are allowed so play smart while trying to stay ahead of the progressing blinds!{newline}{newline}When does it Start?{newline}{newline}The Start timers are dynamic, as soon as it fills up with the right number of players the Tournament starts.{newline}{newline}How is my rank determined?{newline}{newline}Based on time of the bust-out, rank is determined in reverse chronological order. If two players lose at the same time, the player with the larger chip amount before busting out will be ranked higher. In the event of a tie, rank will be determined by our pre-defined rule set.{newline}{newline}PRIZES{newline}{newline}What does 1st place get?{newline}{newline}The 1st place winner of the Multi Table Tournament will receive a unique permanent table Trophy and the chip prize listed in the information page, which can be viewed by tapping the “Tournament” lobby card prior to the start of the tournament.{newline}{newline}Are there other prizes?{newline}{newline}Yes! Depending on the payout schedule, various rank position in the tournament will payout different prizes. The information page will have the payouts listed.{newline}{newline}What happens if I run into problems during the MTT and I’m not able to continue playing?{newline}{newline}Please understand that there might be unexpected technical problems during the tournament. While we’re doing our best to make sure the tournament runs as smoothly as possible, Zynga will not be responsible for any losses incurred by technical problems or natural disasters.
FIRST PLACE WINS THE MTT TROPHY
Please check in 30 minutes before the beginning of the tournament. Tap Lobby Card to check in.

Rules and Prizes{newline}{newline}PLAYOFF TOURNAMENT{newline}{newline}RULES{newline}Congratulations on qualifying for Zynga Poker PLAYOFF TOURNAMENT! Prove you are the best by beating 98 other sharks in the most competitive event in Zynga Poker history!{newline}{newline}How does it work?{newline}You will be competing in a multi-table tournament format game. Each player will begin with the same number of chips and will compete without a break. As players bust out, tables are consolidated down to a final table until one winner remains. No rebuys are allowed so play smart while trying to stay ahead of the progressing blinds!{newline}{newline}When does it Start?{newline}The PLAYOFF TOURNAMENT will begin when the countdown timer under the “TOURNAMENT” lobby card hits 00:00:00. The tournament is expected to last up to 45 ~ 60 minutes if you make it to the final table. Please do not show up late to the tournament as you will NOT be able to join after it has started. Once the tournament has started, if you return to the lobby or leave the game in any way, you will be considered as an active player at the table and continue to post blinds until you return or bust out.{newline}{newline}How is my rank determined?{newline}Based on time of the bust-out, rank is determined in reverse chronological order. If two players lose at the same time, the player with the larger chip amount before busting out will be ranked higher. In the event of a tie, rank will be determined by our pre-defined rule set.{newline}{newline}PRIZES{newline}What does 1st place get?{newline}The 1st place winner of the Playoff Tournament will receive a unique permanent table gift and the chip prize listed in the information page, which can be viewed by tapping the “Tournament” lobby card prior to the start of the tournament.{newline}{newline}What are the other prizes?{newline}2nd place: Permanent Table Gift + Chips listed in the information page{newline}3rd place: Permanent Table Gift + Chips listed in the information page{newline}4th and onward: Permanent Table Gift + decreasing amount of chips by rank{newline}{newline}What happens if I run into problems during the Playoff Tournament and I’m not able to continue playing?{newline}Please understand that there might be unexpected technical problems during the tournament. While we’re doing our best to make sure the tournament runs as smoothly as possible, Zynga will not be responsible for any losses incurred by technical problems or natural disasters.
Tap the "TOURNAMENT” lobby card to check-in 30 minutes before the tournament starts and reserve your seat.

string.original: You're qualified to compete in Playoffs!
Weekly Playoffs are multi-table tournaments that are held once a week for our eligible Leagues players. Advance to higher leagues to get big rewards!

Players in Leagues {tier} and above are eligible to play in the Weekly Playoffs tournament. Each player has one FREE buy-in, and can spend chips for every subsequent buy-in. Eligible players can enter into these tournaments by tapping on the card on the lobby or by the Playoffs tab within the Leagues center.

Players who make it to the final table are all eligible for awards, but the winner of the tournament gets the biggest payout. All winnings are based on your League: e.g., if you are League {tier} you will gain less than a player that is League {topTier}.

To manage or cancel your Membership subscription, tap on the "Manage" button to the right of this question
How do I manage my Membership subscription?

Your Milestone status is determined based on the number of months you have maintained your Membership for. Keep your Membership active in order to progress to the next Milestone and unlock more benefits!

The Player's Club is Zynga Poker's new loyalty program. Members earn Chips, XP, Gold, VIP points, tickets, and have access to Member-exclusive events. The longer you maintain your Membership, the more in-game benefits you will receive!
Yes! You will receive 2000 VIP points for every monthly payment. When you unlock the Executive Vault milestone, you'll get even more VIP points every week!
Do I get VIP points every month?
Yes! As your VIP tier increases from sapphire to emerald to gold and higher, your Vault will give you more chips every week. The bonus you receive is the same amount as the VIP purchase bonus.
Does my VIP tier increase my Vault payout?
Items are delivered to your Vault based on the weekly schedule that is displayed on the Vault page. As your Milestone status increases, you will receive items more frequently.
How often do I get new items?
The Vault is where your items are delivered to. Check your Vault frequently to claim your Items!

In SIT-N-GO tournaments blinds will increase periodically. The amount of chips required for the next blind level as well as the time until the blinds increase is visible while you’re playing. Pay close attention to the blinds and strategize accordingly to avoid being forced all in.
Blinds will increase every {5playerminutes}m:{5playerseconds}s in 5 Player SIT-N-GO tournaments and every {9playerminutes}m:{9playerseconds}s in 9 Player SIT-N-GO tournaments.

The tournament will last until all but one player busts out. 5 Player SIT-N-GO tournaments last approximately 13 minutes from start to finish. 9 Player SIT-N-GO tournaments last approximately 20 minutes from start to finish. If you bust out early, you may leave at any time or stay and watch the rest of the tournament play out.

The tournament will last until all but one player busts out which is approximately 13 minutes from start to finish. If you bust out early, you may leave at any time or stay and watch the rest of the tournament play out.
You can leave at any time but if you leave a tournament that has already started, then you will lose your Buy-In. If you leave before the tournament begins, your Buy-In will be returned to you.

In SIT-N-GO tournaments every player starts with the same number of chips. Rebuys are not allowed and blinds continuously increase. The tournament will last until only 1 player remains. Play smart and stay ahead of the blinds to win!
Payouts are determined by the Buy-In amount you select and your final ranking. Larger payouts are available at higher Buy-Ins. Please refer to the Buy-In screen for additional details.
SIT-N-GO tournaments have no predetermined start time and begin as soon as the table has filled.
